_header: So put in fear I dare not speak
_description: A lover’s lament on his wounded heart — three stanzas rhyme royal

BLAdd5665.Transcription:
…To make hyr oones to loue agayneWhiche wolde me slake of my
                    gret payne
BLAdd5665.Editions:
Fehr,  Bernhard. 
             “Die Lieder der Hs. Add. 5665 (Ritson’s Folio-MS).” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         106 (1901): 262-85: 283.
Stevens,  John,
                        ed.  
             Music and Poetry in the Early Tudor Court.
         London: Methuen, 1961: 345.

BLAdd60577.Transcription:
Soo put in fere I dare not spekeVndur sylens thus I endureHow I
                    myȝt beste of hyr be sureTo make hyr oones to loue agayneWhiche
                    wolde me slake of my gret payne
